title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\BigQueryOptions
name: BigQueryOptions
description:
Options defining BigQuery table and row identifiers.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.BigQueryOptions

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getTableReference
methods.description:
Complete BigQuery table reference.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.BigQueryTable table_reference = 1;

methods.name: setTableReference
methods.description:
Complete BigQuery table reference.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.BigQueryTable table_reference = 1;

methods.name: getIdentifyingFields
methods.description:
References to fields uniquely identifying rows within the table.

Nested fields in the format, like person.birthdate.year, are allowed.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.privacy.dlp.v2.FieldId identifying_fields = 2;

methods.name: setIdentifyingFields
methods.description:
References to fields uniquely identifying rows within the table.

Nested fields in the format, like person.birthdate.year, are allowed.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.privacy.dlp.v2.FieldId identifying_fields = 2;

params.name: var
params.description:
References to fields uniquely identifying rows within the table.

Nested fields in the format, like person.birthdate.year, are allowed.

methods.name: getRowsLimit
methods.description:
Max number of rows to scan. If the table has more rows than this value, the rest of the rows are omitted. If not set, or if set to 0, all rows will be scanned. Cannot be used in conjunction with TimespanConfig.

Generated from protobuf field int64 rows_limit = 3;

methods.name: setRowsLimit
methods.description:
Max number of rows to scan. If the table has more rows than this value, the rest of the rows are omitted. If not set, or if set to 0, all rows will be scanned. Cannot be used in conjunction with TimespanConfig.

Generated from protobuf field int64 rows_limit = 3;
